title: [Ruined Temple, Third Floor]
description: Multi-colored glass shards glimmer in the moonlight beaming down from above.  A handful of jagged pieces still cling to the arched window frames that look out onto the sea.  Snaking through the floor is a maze-like network of fine cracks, though several of the tiles have been completely destroyed.
